Package uk.ac.mmu.advprog.hackathon

Class DB

java.lang.Object
uk.ac.mmu.advprog.hackathon.DB
All Implemented Interfaces:
AutoCloseable
public class DB extends Object implements AutoCloseable
Handles database access from within the web service
Author:
Daniel Lord (12075327)

    DB()
    Creates an instance of the DB object and connects to the database

  • Constructor Details

    • DB

      public DB()
      Creates an instance of the DB object and connects to the database

  • Method Details

    • getNumberOfEntries

      public int getNumberOfEntries()
      Returns the number of entries in the database, by counting rows
      Returns:
      The number of entries in the database, or -1 if empty

    • getLastSignalDisplayed

      public String getLastSignalDisplayed(String signalid)
      Returns the signal value from the database using the signalid parameter, taken from the web service
      Parameters:
      signalid - The signalid to search in the database
      Returns:
      The signal value from the database, or display "No results" if signalid parameter is not found in the database

    • getFrequentlyUsed

      public ArrayList<FrequentlyUsedClass> getFrequentlyUsed(String motorway)
      Returns an ArrayList of FrequencyUsedClass objects, containing the results from the SQL query from the database
      Parameters:
      motorway - The motorway input, taken from the web service, to change in the SQL query to collect the different results from the database
      Returns:
      The results from the SQL query, organised into an ArrayList of FrequencyUsedClass objects

    • getSignalGroups

      public ArrayList<String> getSignalGroups()
      Returns an ArrayList of String objects, containing the results from the SQL query from the database
      Returns:
      The results from the SQL query, organised into an ArrayList of String objects

    • getSignalsByGroupTime

      public ArrayList<SignalsByGroupTimeClass> getSignalsByGroupTime(String signal_group, String time)
      Returns an ArrayList of SignalsByGroupTimeClass objects, containing the results from the SQL query from the database
      Parameters:
      signal_group - The signal_group input, taken from the web service, to change in the SQL query to collect the different results from the database
      time - The time input, taken from the web service, to change in the SQL query to collect the different results from the database
      Returns:
      The results from the SQL query, organised into an ArrayList of SignalsByGroupTimeClass objects

    • close

      public void close()
      Closes the connection to the database, required by AutoCloseable interface.
      Specified by:
      close in interface AutoCloseable
